alert.note: Alert for Cidra; Gurabo; San Lorenzo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 02 at 4:37PM ADT until July 02 at 9:45PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Aguas Buenas, Caguas, Cayey, Cidra, Gurabo and San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Until 645 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Mud slides in areas of steep terrain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 335 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Mud slides have been reported. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
